channel.title: Parquet â€“ Release
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Parquet

item.title: Blog: 1.13.1
item.description:
The latest version of parquet-mr is 1.13.1.

To check the validity of this release, use its:

  • Release manager OpenPGP key
  • OpenPGP signature
  • SHA-512

The latest version of parquet-mr on the previous minor branch is 1.12.3.

To check the validity of this release, use its:

  • Release manager OpenPGP key
  • OpenPGP signature
  • SHA-512

Downloading from the Maven central repository

The Parquet team publishes its releases to Maven Central.

Add the following dependency section to your pom.xml:

 <dependencies>
...
<dependency>
<groupId>org.apache.parquet</groupId>
<artifactId>parquet-avro</artifactId>
<version>1.13.1</version> <!-- or latest version -->
</dependency>
...
</dependencies>

Older Releases

Older releases can be found in the Archives of the Apache Software Foundation: https://archive.apache.org/dist/parquet/
